mapper.select: select t.* from ( select date_format(str_to_date(stat_de, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') stat_de , requst_cnt , succes_cnt , failr_cnt from stat_crtt_day order by stat_de desc limit 5 ) t order by stat_de

select cf_tot , cf_pass , cf_fail , round((cf_pass / case when cf_tot > 0 then cf_tot else 1 end) * 100, 2) as cf_pass_rate , round((cf_fail / case when cf_tot > 0 then cf_tot else 1 end) * 100, 2) as cf_fail_rate from ( select count(1) as cf_tot , ifnull(sum(case when result_cd = 1 then 1 else 0 end), 0) as cf_pass , ifnull(sum(case when result_cd = 0 then 1 else 0 end), 0) as cf_fail from history where request_dt >= current_date() ) t
